aboutSubtitle: Learn more about our mission, our team, and the technology behind the fun.
gameDescription1: This application was created as a practical training project to strengthen our skills in modern development. Built with Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS, it represents the work of NextGen Code, a team of motivated computer science students from the SESAME Program, Class of 2025, dedicated to learning by building real projects. This is version 1.0 of the application.
gameDescription2: We leverage Google's generative AI to dynamically create quiz questions, tailoring the difficulty to your performance history. This ensures that you are always challenged but never overwhelmed.
groupSubtitle: Passionate computer science students from the Sésame Program, Class of 2025.
groupDescription: We are NextGen Code, a dynamic group of young computer science students from the Sésame Program's Class of 2025. Passionate about web and mobile development, our mission is to build modern, innovative, and useful solutions. We thrive on teamwork, creativity, and a shared commitment to growing together in the digital world.
creatorSubtitle: Meet the lead visionary behind the project.
creatorDescription: I'm Nomentsoa Patrick, a tech enthusiast from Madagascar working toward becoming a full-stack developer and data scientist. Self-taught since March 2025, I'm now studying at EMIT Fianarantsoa to turn my ambition into real, impactful projects. Feel free to connect with me!
